verses.text: And \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*: for all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* to make him \w king|strong="H4427"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, who was yet in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add of it\add*, (for he was \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* from the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*;)

That they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* him. And \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* and all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w made|strong="H7185"\w* our \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w grievous|strong="H7185"\w*: now therefore make thou the \w grievous|strong="H7186"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and his \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* which he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon us, \w lighter|strong="H7043"\w*, and we will \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thee.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Depart|strong="H3212"\w* yet \add for\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, then come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to me. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*.

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w consulted|strong="H3289"\w* with the old \w men|strong="H2205"\w*, that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* while he yet \w lived|strong="H2416"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, How do ye \w advise|strong="H3289"\w* that I \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w answer|strong="H1697"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*?

And they \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If thou wilt be a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* unto this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and wilt \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, and \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* them, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* to them, then they will be thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.

But he \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the old \w men|strong="H2205"\w*, which they had \w given|strong="H3289"\w* him, and \w consulted|strong="H3289"\w* with the young \w men|strong="H3206"\w* that were grown \w up|strong="H1431"\w* with him, \add and\add* which \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him:

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, What counsel \w give|strong="H3289"\w* ye that we \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w answer|strong="H1697"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, who have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* to me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Make|strong="H7043"\w* the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* which thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* did \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon us \w lighter|strong="H7043"\w*?

And the young \w men|strong="H3206"\w* that were grown \w up|strong="H1431"\w* with him \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus shalt thou \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w made|strong="H3513"\w* our \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*, but make thou \add it\add* \w lighter|strong="H7043"\w* unto us; thus shalt thou \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, My \w little|strong="H6995"\w* \add finger\add* shall be \w thicker|strong="H5666"\w* than my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*.

And now whereas my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* did \w lade|strong="H6006"\w* you with a \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*, I will \w add|strong="H3254"\w* to your \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*: my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w chastised|strong="H3256"\w* you with \w whips|strong="H7752"\w*, but I will \w chastise|strong="H3256"\w* you with \w scorpions|strong="H6137"\w*.

¶ So \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, as the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had \w appointed|strong="H1696"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Come to me \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w roughly|strong="H7186"\w*, and \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the old \w men’s|strong="H2205"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* that they \w gave|strong="H3289"\w* him;\f + \fr 12.13 \ft roughly: Heb. hardly\f*

And \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to them after the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the young \w men|strong="H3206"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w made|strong="H3513"\w* your \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*, and I will \w add|strong="H3254"\w* to your \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*: my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \add also\add* \w chastised|strong="H3256"\w* you with \w whips|strong="H7752"\w*, but I will \w chastise|strong="H3256"\w* you with \w scorpions|strong="H6137"\w*.

Wherefore the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; for the \w cause|strong="H5438"\w* was from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that he might \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* his \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* the \w Shilonite|strong="H7888"\w* unto \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*.

¶ \w So|strong="H7725"\w* when all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto them, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H1697"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* have we in \w David|strong="H1732"\w*? neither \add have we\add* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* in the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*: to your \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: now \w see|strong="H7200"\w* to thine own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. So \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* unto their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*.

But \add as for\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over them.

Then \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Adoram|strong="H0151"\w*, who \add was\add* over the \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w*; and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w stoned|strong="H7275"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, that he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. Therefore \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* made \w speed|strong="H0553"\w* to get him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to his \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w*, to \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 12.18 \ft made…: Heb. strengthened himself\f*

So \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 12.19 \ft rebelled: or, fell away\f*

And it came to pass, when all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* was come \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, that they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* him unto the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, and made him \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: there was none that \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w but|strong="H2108"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* only.

¶ And when \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, he \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, with the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* chosen \w men|strong="H0977"\w*, which were \w warriors|strong="H6213"\w*, to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.
But the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* came unto \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and unto all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and to the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, Ye shall not go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, nor \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w return|strong="H7725"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; for this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* from me. They \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* therefore to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ Then \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* therein; and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from thence, and \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w*.

And \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, Now shall the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*:

If this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, then shall the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto their \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \add even\add* unto \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and they shall \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* me, and go \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

Whereupon the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* took \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w calves|strong="H5695"\w* \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, It is too \w much|strong="H7227"\w* for you to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: behold thy \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which brought thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.
And he \w set|strong="H7760"\w* the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* he in \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.

And this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* became a \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*: for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \add to worship\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, \add even\add* unto \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the \w lowest|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which were not of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*.

And \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w ordained|strong="H6213"\w* a \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* in the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, on the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, like unto the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* that \add is\add* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and he \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*. So \w did|strong="H6213"\w* he in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, \w sacrificing|strong="H2076"\w* unto the \w calves|strong="H5695"\w* that he had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*: and he \w placed|strong="H5975"\w* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* which he had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.\f + \fr 12.32 \ft offered…: or, went up to the altar, etc\f*\f + \fr 12.32 \ft sacrificing: or, to sacrifice\f*

So he \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* which he had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* the \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add even\add* in the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* which he had \w devised|strong="H0908"\w* of his own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; and \w ordained|strong="H6213"\w* a \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and he \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w*.\f + \fr 12.33 \ft offered…: or, went up to the altar, etc\f*\f + \fr 12.33 \ft and burnt…: Heb. to burn incense\f*
